skill.name: cosmic-database
skill.description: Access COSMIC cancer mutation database. Query somatic mutations, Cancer Gene Census, mutational signatures, gene fusions, for cancer research and precision oncology. Requires authentication.
skill.summary: Access COSMIC cancer mutation database. Query somatic mutations, Cancer Gene Census, mutational sign...
skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: The code performs authenticated downloads from the COSMIC domain and writes files locally. No credential harvesting, obfuscation, or execution of downloaded payloads was found.

content.value_statement: You need reliable access to COSMIC cancer mutation files for analysis. This skill downloads authenticated COSMIC datasets and provides common file paths for faster setup.
actual_capabilities: Download COSMIC files with email and password authentication
Resolve common COSMIC file paths by data type and genome assembly
Stream large downloads with progress output
Provide CLI for data type, assembly, and version selection
Return success or error status for downloads
limitations: Requires a registered COSMIC account and valid credentials
Requires internet access to the COSMIC download service
Does not query or analyze data beyond downloading files
File availability depends on COSMIC versions and licensing

use_cases.title: Get mutation exports
use_cases.description: Download core mutation files for a specific COSMIC release and genome assembly.

use_cases.title: Automate data pulls
use_cases.description: Script repeatable COSMIC downloads for pipelines and reproducible analyses.

use_cases.title: Access gene census
use_cases.description: Retrieve Cancer Gene Census files to support gene prioritization workflows.

prompt_templates.title: Basic download
prompt_templates.prompt: Download the latest COSMIC coding mutations file for GRCh38 and save it as cosmic_mutations.tsv.gz.

prompt_templates.title: Gene census
prompt_templates.prompt: Get the Cancer Gene Census file for GRCh38 and name it cancer_gene_census.csv.

prompt_templates.title: Versioned file
prompt_templates.prompt: Download COSMIC version v102 structural variants for GRCh37 and save it as cosmic_structural.tsv.gz.

prompt_templates.title: Custom path
prompt_templates.prompt: Download the COSMIC file at GRCh38/cosmic/latest/CosmicResistanceMutations.tsv.gz and save it as resistance.tsv.gz.

output_examples.input: Download the latest Cancer Gene Census for GRCh38.
output: Requested download URL for the gene census file
Saved as cancer_gene_census.csv in the current folder

best_practices: Use the latest version for ongoing studies and a fixed version for reproducibility
Confirm available disk space before large file downloads
Store credentials securely and avoid sharing them in logs
anti_patterns: Using the skill without a valid COSMIC account
Requesting analysis or filtering of data within the downloader
Assuming files exist without checking version and assembly

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes, it provides a Python script and CLI that can be used in those environments.

faq.question: What limits apply to downloads?
faq.answer: Limits depend on COSMIC access rights and the size of the files requested.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with pipelines?
faq.answer: Yes, the CLI and helper functions are designed for scripted workflows.

faq.question: Does it store or transmit my credentials?
faq.answer: Credentials are used only for COSMIC authentication and are not stored by the script.

faq.question: What if I get authentication errors?
faq.answer: Verify your COSMIC registration, license status, and correct email and password.

faq.question: How does it compare to web downloads?
faq.answer: It provides automated, scriptable downloads and reusable file path helpers.
